page.description: The INET::SSLSocket::WriteBinary() method writes binary data to the connection.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = WriteBinary(Data as B [, Length as N])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Data
argument.description: Binary data to write to the connection.

argument.name: Length
argument.description: The number of bytes of data to write.
